name: Antidote (Greater)
desc: An antidote protects you against toxins. You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons.

hints.desc: You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons.

name: Juggernaut Mutagen (Moderate)
desc: After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant. Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saves and 10 temporary Hit Points. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks, and initiative rolls.
inputRequired: Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, grant yourself the temporary Hit Points again.

hints.desc: You take a -2 penalty to Initiative rolls.

name: Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)
desc: After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant. Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saves and 45 temporary Hit Points. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead, and your critical failures on Fortitude saves become failures instead. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks, and initiative rolls.
inputRequired: Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, grant yourself the temporary Hit Points again.

hints.desc: You take a -2 penalty to Initiative rolls.
When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead, and your critical failures on Fortitude saves become failures instead.

name: Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)
desc: After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant. Benefit You gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves and 5 temporary Hit Points. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks, and initiative rolls.
inputRequired: Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, grant yourself the temporary Hit Points again.

hints.desc: You take a -2 penalty to Initiative rolls.

name: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)
desc: After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant. Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saves and 30 temporary Hit Points. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks, and initiative rolls.
inputRequired: Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, grant yourself the temporary Hit Points again.

hints.desc: You take a -2 penalty to Initiative rolls.
When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead.

name: Infiltrator's Elixir
desc:
You take the shape of a humanoid creature of your size, but different enough so you might be unrecognizable. If you aren't a humanoid, you might take on a form more similar to your own, at the GM's discretion.

The creator of the elixir decides the basics of the appearance you transform into when you imbibe the elixir, including eye color, skin tone, and hair color. The elixir can't change your form into that of a specific person.

Drinking this elixir counts as setting up a disguise to Impersonate. You gain a +4 status bonus to your Deception DC to avoid others seeing through your disguise, and you add your level to this DC even if untrained.

hints.desc: You gain a +4 status bonus to your Deception DC to avoid others seeing through your disguise, and you add your level to this DC even if untrained.

name: Energy Mutagen Discharge
desc: (Energy Mutagen Discharge removes greater and major Energy Mutagen conditions and then immediately ends. It can't be chosen manually.)

name: Lastwall Soup
desc: A bowl of Lastwall soup is as nourishing as a full meal. In addition, for 1 hour after consuming a bowl of Lastwall soup, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and DCs against undead.

hints.desc: You gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and DCs against undead.

name: Energy Mutagen (Fire, Moderate)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with fire energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain fire resistance 10. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d4 fire damage. Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, cold and electricity.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1d4 Fire| 1d4 fire damage.

name: Energy Mutagen (Fire, Lesser)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with fire energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain fire resistance 5. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1 point of fire damage. Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, cold and electricity.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1 Fire| 1 point of fire damage.

name: Energy Mutagen (Fire, Greater)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with fire energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain fire resistance 15. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d6 fire damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals 2d6 fire damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 25 basic Reflex save). Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, cold and electricity.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1d6 Fire| 1d6 fire damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals |dice=2d6 Fire| 2d6 fire damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 25 basic Reflex save).

name: Energy Mutagen (Electricity, Moderate)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with electricity energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain electricity resistance 10. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d4 electricity damage. Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, cold and fire.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1d4 Electricity| 1d4 electricity damage.

name: Energy Mutagen (Electricity, Major)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with electricity energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain electricity resistance 20. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 2d6 electricity damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals 3d6 electricity damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 32 basic Reflex save). Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, cold and fire.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=2d6 Electricity| 2d6 electricity damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals |dice=3d6 Electricity| 3d6 electricity damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 32 basic Reflex save).

name: Energy Mutagen (Electricity, Lesser)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with electricity energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain electricity resistance 5. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1 point of electricity damage. Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, cold and fire.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1 Electricity| 1 point of electricity damage.

name: Energy Mutagen (Electricity, Greater)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with electricity energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain electricity resistance 15. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d6 electricity damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals 2d6 electricity damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 25 basic Reflex save). Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, cold and fire.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1d6 Electricity| 1d6 electricity damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals |dice=2d6 Electricity| 2d6 electricity damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 25 basic Reflex save).

name: Energy Mutagen (Fire, Major)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with fire energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain fire resistance 20. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 2d6 fire damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals 3d6 fire damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 32 basic Reflex save). Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, cold and electricity.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=2d6 Fire| 2d6 fire damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals |dice=3d6 Fire| 3d6 fire damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 32 basic Reflex save).

name: Leaper's Elixir (Greater)
desc: You can High Jump or Long Jump as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don't perform the initial Stride (nor do you fail if you don't Stride 10 feet). The maximum vertical distance you can jump with a High Jump is the same as you can jump horizontally with a Long Jump.

hints.desc: You can High Jump or Long Jump as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don't perform the initial Stride (nor do you fail if you don't Stride 10 feet). The maximum vertical distance you can jump with a High Jump is the same as you can jump horizontally with a Long Jump.

name: Leaper's Elixir (Lesser)
desc: You can High Jump or Long Jump as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don't perform the initial Stride (nor do you fail if you don't Stride 10 feet).

hints.desc: You can High Jump or Long Jump as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don't perform the initial Stride (nor do you fail if you don't Stride 10 feet).

name: Mistform Elixir
desc: A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you concealed for the duration. As usual being concealed when your position is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak.

name: Winter Wolf Elixir (Greater)
desc: This elixir warms your core and improves your circulation. You are protected from the effects of severe, extreme and incredible cold.

hints.desc: You are protected from the effects of severe, extreme and incredible cold.

name: Stone Fist Elixir
desc: Your fists become hard as stone. They deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage and lose the nonlethal trait.

name: Stone Body Mutagen
desc: This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone. Benefit You gain resistance to physical damage (except bludgeoning) equal to the value * 5. Drawback Your Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

name: Silvertongue Mutagen
desc: Your features become striking and your voice becomes musical and commanding, though facts and figures become hazy for you and emotion clouds your ability to reason. Benefit You gain an item bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance checks. Your critical failures with any of these skill become failures instead. Drawback You take a -2 item penalty to Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, and Society checks. Choose one skill in which you are trained; for the duration, you become untrained in that skill. All your failures on checks to Recall Knowledge become critical failures.

hints.desc: Your critical failures with Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation and Performance checks become failures instead.
You are untrained in one chosen skill that you are usually trained with.
All your failures on checks to Recall Knowledge become critical failures.
hints.showon: Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Medicine, Nature, Occultism, Religion, Society

name: Serene Mutagen (Moderate)
desc: You gain inner serenity, focused on fine details and steeled against mental assaults, but you find violence off-putting. Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to Will saves and Perception, Medicine, Nature, Religion, and Survival checks. This bonus improves by 1 when you attempt Will saves against mental effects. Drawback You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.

hints.desc: You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.
hints.showon: Will, Perception, Medicine, Nature, Religion, Survival, Spellbook, Attacks

hints.desc: Your item bonus from Serene Mutagen improves by 1 when you attempt Will saves against mental effects.

name: Serene Mutagen (Major)
desc: You gain inner serenity, focused on fine details and steeled against mental assaults, but you find violence off-putting. Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Will saves and Perception, Medicine, Nature, Religion, and Survival checks. When you roll a success on a Will save against a mental effect, you get a critical success instead, and your critical failures on Will saves against mental effects become failures instead. Drawback You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.

hints.desc: You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.
Your item bonus from Serene Mutagen improves by 1 when you attempt Will saves against mental effects.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.

hints.desc: You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells.

When you roll a success on a Will save against a mental effect, you get a critical success instead. Drawback You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.

hints.desc: You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack, and spell damage.
hints.showon: Will, Perception, Medicine, Nature, Religion, Survival, Spellbook, Attacks

hints.desc: Your item bonus from Serene Mutagen improves by 1 when you attempt Will saves against mental effects.

name: Sea Touch Elixir (Lesser)
desc: This briny concoction alters the skin on your hands and feet. The spaces between your fingers and toes become webbed, granting you a swim Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration.

name: Sea Touch Elixir
desc: This briny concoction alters the skin on your hands and feet. The spaces between your fingers and toes become webbed, granting you a swim Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration. Addictionally, you can breathe underwater.

hints.desc: You can breathe underwater.

name: Salamander Elixir (Moderate)
desc: This elixir is made from salamander scales to withstand fire. You are protected from the effects of severe and extreme heat.

hints.desc: You are protected from the effects of severe and extreme heat.

name: Salamander Elixir (Lesser)
desc: This elixir is made from salamander scales to withstand fire. You are protected from the effects of severe heat.

hints.desc: You are protected from the effects of severe heat.

name: Salamander Elixir (Greater)
desc: This elixir is made from salamander scales to withstand fire. You are protected from the effects of severe, extreme and incredible heat.

hints.desc: You are protected from the effects of severe, extreme and incredible heat.

name: Quicksilver Mutagen
desc: Your features become thin and angular. You become swifter and nimbler, but your body also becomes fragile. Benefit You gain an item bonus equal to the value to Acrobatics checks, Stealth checks, Thievery checks, Reflex saves, and ranged attack rolls, and you gain a status bonus equal to the value * 5 to your Speed. Drawback You take damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost in this way by any means while the mutagen lasts. You take a -2 penalty to Fortitude saves.
inputRequired: You have taken damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost in this way by any means while the mutagen lasts.

name: Potion of Flying
desc: You gain a fly Speed of 40 feet for the duration.

name: Energy Mutagen (Cold, Moderate)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with cold energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain cold resistance 10. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d4 cold damage. Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, electricity and fire.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1d4 Cold| 1d4 cold damage.

desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with cold energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain cold resistance 20. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 2d6 cold damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals 3d6 cold damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 32 basic Reflex save). Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, electricity and fire.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=2d6 Cold| 2d6 cold damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals |dice=3d6 Cold| 3d6 cold damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 32 basic Reflex save).

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1 Cold| 1 point of cold damage.

name: Energy Mutagen (Cold, Greater)
desc: The mutagen suffuses your body with cold energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. Benefit You gain cold resistance 15. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d6 cold damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals 2d6 cold damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 25 basic Reflex save). Drawback You gain weakness 5 to acid, electricity and fire.

hints.desc: Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add |dice=1d6 Cold| 1d6 cold damage. You can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy that deals |dice=2d6 Cold| 2d6 cold damage for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (DC 25 basic Reflex save).

name: Cheetah's Elixir
desc: Enzymatic compounds in this elixir strengthen and excite the muscles in your legs. You gain a status bonus to your Speed equal to the value for the duration.

name: Cat's Eye Elixir
desc: Your vision sharpens and you become sensitive to even the most minute movements. You reduce the flat check to target hidden creatures to 5, and you don't need to attempt a flat check to target concealed creatures. These benefits apply only against creatures within 30 feet of you.

hints.desc: You reduce the flat check to target hidden creatures to 5, and you don't need to attempt a flat check to target concealed creatures. These benefits apply only against creatures within 30 feet of you.

name: Bravo's Brew (Greater)
desc: This flask of foaming beer grants courage. You gain an item bonus to Will saves equal to the value, which is greater by 1 when attempting Will saves against fear. If you roll a success on a save against fear, you get a critical success instead.

hints.desc: Your item bonus from Bravo's Brew is improved by 1 when attempting Will saves against fear. If you roll a success on a save against fear, you get a critical success instead.

name: Bravo's Brew
desc: This flask of foaming beer grants courage. You gain an item bonus to Will saves equal to the value, which is greater by 1 when attempting Will saves against fear.

hints.desc: Your item bonus from Bravo's Brew is improved by 1 when attempting Will saves against fear.

name: Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser)
desc: This tincture lets you pinpoint your foes. Your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover.

hints.desc: Your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover by 1.

name: Bomber's Eye Elixir (Greater)
desc: This tincture lets you pinpoint your foes. Your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover.

hints.desc: Your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover by 2.

name: Blessed Alchemical Item
desc: A blessed alchemical item is an alchemical item that restores hit points and was Crafted by a character with the Bless Tonic feat. After you regained Hit Points using a blessed alchemical item, the overflowing energy grants you negative resistance 5 for 1 round, or negative resistance 10 if the crafter is legendary in Crafting.

name: Bestial Mutagen
desc: Your features transform into something bestial and you take on muscle mass, but your lumbering form is clumsy. Benefit You gain an item bonus to Athletics checks and unarmed attack rolls equal to the value. You gain a claw unarmed attack with the agile trait and a jaws unarmed attack. Drawback You take a -1 penalty to AC and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves. The bonus depends on the quality of the mutagen: Lesser You gain a +1 item bonus, your claw deals 1d4 slashing damage, your jaws deal 1d6 piercing damage, and the duration is 1 minute. Moderate You gain a +2 item bonus, your claw deals 1d6 slashing damage, your jaws deal 1d8 piercing damage, and the duration is 10 minutes. Greater You gain a +3 item bonus, your claw deals 1d8 slashing damage, your jaws deal 1d10 piercing damage, and the duration is 1 minute. Major You gain a +4 item bonus, your claw deals 1d8 slashing damage, your jaws deal 1d10 piercing damage, and the duration is 1 hour. You gain weapon specialization with the claws and jaws, or greater weapon specialization, if you already have weapon specialization with these unarmed attacks.

name: Antiplague (Moderate)
desc: Antiplague can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

hints.desc: You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

name: Antiplague (Major)
desc: Antiplague can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

hints.desc: You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

name: Antiplague (Lesser)
desc: Antiplague can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. You gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

hints.desc: You gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

name: Antiplague (Greater)
desc: Antiplague can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

hints.desc: You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

name: Antidote (Moderate)
desc: An antidote protects you against toxins. You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons.

hints.desc: You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons.

name: Antidote (Major)
desc: An antidote protects you against toxins. You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons. When you drink the antidote, you can immediately attempt a saving throw against one poison of 14th level or lower affecting you. If you succeed, the poison is neutralized.

hints.desc: You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons.

name: Antidote (Lesser)
desc: An antidote protects you against toxins. You gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons.

hints.desc: You gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons.

name: Cognitive Mutagen (Greater)
desc: Your mind becomes clear and cognition flows freely, but physical matters seem ephemeral. Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, and Society checks and all checks to Recall Knowledge. Your critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks become failures instead. You become trained in one Intelligence-based skill, chosen at creation. Drawback You take a -2 penalty to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, Athletics checks, and Acrobatics checks. You can carry 2 less Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered, and the maximum Bulk you can carry is reduced by 4.

hints.desc: You gain a +3 item bonus to all checks to Recall Knowledge. Your critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks become failures instead. You become trained in one Intelligence-based skill, chosen at creation.
hints.showon: Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Medicine, Nature, Occultism, Religion, Society

name: Winter Wolf Elixir (Lesser)
desc: This elixir warms your core and improves your circulation. You are protected from the effects of severe cold.

hints.desc: You are protected from the effects of severe cold.

name: Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)
desc: Your mind becomes clear and cognition flows freely, but physical matters seem ephemeral. Benefit You gain a +1 item bonus to Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, and Society checks and all checks to Recall Knowledge. Your critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks become failures instead. Drawback You take a -2 penalty to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, Athletics checks, and Acrobatics checks. You can carry 2 less Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered, and the maximum Bulk you can carry is reduced by 4.

name: Elixir of Rejuvenation
desc: (Elixir of Rejuvenation removes the Dead and Dying conditions and then immediately ends. It can't be chosen manually.)

name: Elixir of Life (True)
desc: Elixirs of life accelerate the body's natural healing processes and immune system. You gain a +4 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for the duration.

hints.desc: You gain a +4 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons.

name: Elixir of Life (Moderate)
desc: Elixirs of life accelerate the body's natural healing processes and immune system. You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for the duration.

hints.desc: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons.

name: Elixir of Life (Minor)
desc: Elixirs of life accelerate the body's natural healing processes and immune system. You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for the duration.

hints.desc: You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons.

name: Elixir of Life (Major)
desc: Elixirs of life accelerate the body's natural healing processes and immune system. You gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for the duration.

hints.desc: You gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons.

name: Elixir of Life (Lesser)
desc: Elixirs of life accelerate the body's natural healing processes and immune system. You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for the duration.

hints.desc: You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons.

name: Elixir of Life (Greater)
desc: Elixirs of life accelerate the body's natural healing processes and immune system. You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for the duration.

hints.desc: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons.

name: Eagle-Eye Elixir (Major)
desc: You notice subtle visual details. You gain an Item bonus to Perception checks equal to the value that is improved by 1 when attempting to find secret doors and traps. Each time you pass within 10 feet of a secret door or trap, the GM automatically rolls a secret check for you to find it.

hints.desc: Your item bonus from Eagle-Eye Elixir is improved by 1 when attempting to find secret doors and traps. Each time you pass within 10 feet of a secret door or trap, the GM automatically rolls a secret check for you to find it.

name: Eagle-Eye Elixir
desc: You notice subtle visual details. You gain an Item bonus to Perception checks equal to the value that is improved by 1 when attempting to find secret doors and traps.

hints.desc: Your item bonus from Eagle-Eye Elixir is improved by 1 when attempting to find secret doors and traps.

name: Darkvision Elixir
desc: Your sight becomes sharper in darkness. You gain darkvision for the duration.

name: Comprehension Elixir
desc: You can understand any words you read, so long as they are written in a common language. This elixir doesn't automatically allow you to understand codes or extremely esoteric passages - you still need to attempt a skill check to Decipher Writing.

hints.desc: You can understand any words you read, so long as they are written in a common language. This elixir doesn't automatically allow you to understand codes or extremely esoteric passages - you still need to attempt a skill check to Decipher Writing.

name: Cognitive Mutagen (Major)
desc: Your mind becomes clear and cognition flows freely, but physical matters seem ephemeral. Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, and Society checks and all checks to Recall Knowledge. Your critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks become failures instead. You become trained in one, chosen at creation. Drawback You take a -2 penalty to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, Athletics checks, and Acrobatics checks. You can carry 2 less Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered, and the maximum Bulk you can carry is reduced by 4.

hints.desc: You gain a +4 item bonus to all checks to Recall Knowledge. Your critical failures on Recall Knowledge checks become failures instead. You become trained in one skill, chosen at creation.
hints.showon: Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Medicine, Nature, Occultism, Religion, Society

name: Winter Wolf Elixir (Moderate)
desc: This elixir warms your core and improves your circulation. You are protected from the effects of severe and extreme cold.

hints.desc: You are protected from the effects of severe and extreme cold.
